title: Login issues
body: Recently I played, and when i logged out, it's stuck on the logging in loading box and all of the sudden, it says i disconnected from the server or my internet provider. HOWEVER WHEN I CHECKED MY INTERNET IT WAS FULL BARS AND WORKING FINE. I've gone through many of the "ways to fix" the client by using the hextech repair tool, force repatch, uninstalling and reinstalling; however none of these "solutions" to my problem have not work the slightest. If there's anyone that can help me please let me know.

replies.body: Even if your internet is fine, you could still have problems connecting to the game server specifically.  I know you've done a few steps already, but these steps mostly resolve file problems and not connection.  Instead I suggest going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Hope that helps!
